typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		Name as string,
		City as string,
		address as string,
		dno as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputemp
source(output(
		dno as string,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptscr
inputemp derive(Name = upper(Name)) ~> ModifyColumns1
ModifyColumns1, deptscr join(inputemp@dno == deptscr@dno,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(deptscr@dno),
	empcnt = countDistinct(Id)) ~> Aggregate1
